description:
Kei has one last chance to intercept Sato, but he needs Tosaki to ask for an uncomfortable favor. Sato prepares a secret weapon.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Ce pays va connaître une certaine instabilité
Kono Kuni Chotto Taihen na Koto ni Naru kara
This Country Is Going to Get a Little Unsettled
W tym kraju zrobi się nieco niespokojnie
この国ちょっと大変なことになるから
이 나라, 조금 큰 일이 날 거야
